title: Failed To Redeem Riot Pionts(RP)
body:
This morning I redeemed a $25AUD RP card, when I enter the code it say successfully redeemed. But the RP didn't appear on the account and the purchase didn't appear on the RP purchase history either.

After that I realized the was a sign next to the PLAY button that said RP purchases temporarily unavailable.

I want to know when will I receive my RP.

P.S I found a player with the same problem too

replies.body: There is a lot off people here in the same boat bro i got two $10 RP prepaid cards put it on and got nothing and still haven't we still haven't had any word off what they are going to do about it as they will not respond to any off the forums about this RP problem right now there are so many going around just seeking answers please Riot Help us all out.
Iâ€˜ve sent a few requests in through the support, still waiting for a reply
Yeah I sent in a ticket but we could be waiting like a week before we hear back. I imagine a lot off us would've sent a ticket
this is a bloody joke never again will Riot get money out off me

Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to have them check out the situation and add the RP to your account manually.

Please note, support is currently backlogged and requests could take up to 48 hours (Or longer) for an initial response.
Yeah, that's what I meant by sending requests

You shouldn't send more than one support ticket in at a time, this just pushes you right back to the start of the queue and backlogs support even further. Please stick to one ticket and do not add unnecessary replies.
Can you tell us all that we will get the RP we brought with our money. or are we not getting it we all want to know because this has gone on long enough with no response by riot

Relax, if you purchased RP and it was not credited to your account of course you will be receiving it.

Please just wait for a response on your ticket, do not bump your ticket, do not open new tickets. This will just push you further back down the queue.

Support is currently backlogged and will take longer to reply than usual, please be patient.
To be fair after this is resolved and i get the RP I brought I will never spend money on it again unless Riot has a amazing reason to why this has happened
